verses.name: Luke 22:11
verses.text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house, The Master saith unto thee, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?

verses.name: Luke 22:12
verses.text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.

verses.name: Luke 22:13
verses.text: And they went, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.

verses.name: Luke 22:14
verses.text: And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.

verses.name: Luke 22:15
verses.text: And he said unto them, With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer:
